column4: Hardy comes with new gnome display properties window.. is this a part of Gnome or is it made especially for Ubuntu?
Hardy comes with new gnome display properties window.. is this a part of Gnome or is it made especially for Ubuntu?
I think it's part of gnome
hmm.. i have installed the same gnome version on Gentoo and this window looks different.. it's very simple and shows only one of my displays
